## mole domains add proxy

Add a reverse proxy

### Synopsis

Add supports adding a reverse proxy partial config.

```
mole domains add proxy [project name/id] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --domain string   Domain *required
  -h, --help            help for proxy
  -p, --port int        Port *required
```
